humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma in the right breast measures 3 cm, which falls within the T2 category (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has invasive ductal carcinoma in the right breast, measuring 3 cm in size (gross description section). The T stage for breast cancer is based on the size of the tumor, with T1 being 2 cm or less, T2 being more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, T3 being more than 5 cm, and T4 being any size with direct extension to the chest wall or skin. Therefore, the patient's T stage is T2.
